feed.title: MediaCMS Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for MediaCMS: v3.1.0
entry.content:
Features

  • Improve and document local developer experience https://github.com/mediacms-io/mediacms/pull/911

Bugs

  • Issue with nulll URL in encoding #912

entry.title: New release for MediaCMS: v3.2.0
entry.content:
Features

  • Speed up docker start (https://github.com/mediacms-io/mediacms/commit/d665058b80eeea24aec67ae7032b06cd2725d065 and https://github.com/mediacms-io/mediacms/commit/1adee8c156c11b0f21312d55ac35b711a5205ebb)

Bugs

  • Adds validation on uploaded file to address potential security issue - https://github.com/mediacms-io/mediacms/commit/986c7d1074aac3041809e11a021770c8e834dc5d
  • Remove Postgres warning error - https://github.com/mediacms-io/mediacms/commit/ffd7a52863c1355681f316a11b021cf0346dcead

entry.title: New release for MediaCMS: v3.3.0
entry.content: This release mainly updates a PUT endpoint not to change the media file but only the metadata - https://github.com/mediacms-io/mediacms/commit/94c646fdb889b7ce4a0a72995c0a843d9d73b78d

entry.title: New release for MediaCMS: v3.4.0
entry.content: This release is adding rounded corners on media https://github.com/mediacms-io/mediacms/pull/1067

entry.title: New release for MediaCMS: v3.5.0
entry.content: This release contains a fix where transcoding of videos failed in some cases - https://github.com/mediacms-io/mediacms/commit/ef4067cbdd1f1bc62c03ba78d17b91af42718e82
